item.title: Nvidia announces new chips at GTC Conference. What analysts had to say
item.description: Wall Street analysts left Nvidia's flagship GPU Technology Conference on Tuesday feeling generally optimistic on the AI darling's future.

item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The sell-off resumed on Tuesday, with the S&P 500 dipping 1% and the Dow Industrials losing about 260 points. Here's what's on CNBC's radar for Wednes...

item.title: Buy the dip in stocks like Alphabet and Block, chief investment strategist says
item.description: ERShares' Eva Ados appeared on CNBC's "Power Lunch" to give her take on some of the market's biggest movers of the day.

item.title: Stocks are falling again. Why the Fed may have a tough time putting a lid on market volatility
item.description: The Federal Reserve's economic projections could still be hampered by tariff uncertainty, even with signs the economy is slowing.

item.title: Barry Ritholtz says investors should not interfere with the magic of compounding
item.description: "Longevity is a giant asset if you're trying to put up numbers," Ritholtz said.
